verses.verse: Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6378>vial<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H3332>poured<s%> it upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Is it not because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee to be <S%H5057>captain<s%> over his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>?

When thou art <S%H3212>departed<s%> from <S%H5978>me<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>, then thou shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> by <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H6900>sepulchre<s%> in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> at <S%H6766>Zelzah<s%>; and they will <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, The <S%H860>asses<s%> which thou <S%H1980>wentest<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%>: and, lo, thy <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H5203>left<s%> the <S%H1697>care<s%> of the <S%H860>asses<s%>, and <S%H1672>sorroweth<s%> for you, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%>? care: Heb. business

Then shalt thou go <S%H2498>on<s%> <S%H1973>forward<s%> from thence, and thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>, and there shall <S%H4672>meet<s%> thee <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> going <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1423>kids<s%>, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> a <S%H5035>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>:

And they <S%H7592>will<s%> <S%H7965>salute<s%> thee, and <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread<s%>; which thou shalt <S%H3947>receive<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>. salute: Heb. ask thee of peace

<S%H310>After<s%> that thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, where is the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and it shall come to pass, when thou art come <S%H935>thither<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%>, that thou shalt <S%H6293>meet<s%> a <S%H2256>company<s%> of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> coming <S%H3381>down<s%> from the high <S%H1116>place<s%> with a <S%H5035>psaltery<s%>, and a <S%H8596>tabret<s%>, and a <S%H2485>pipe<s%>, and a <S%H3658>harp<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and they shall <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>:

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6743>come<s%> upon thee, and thou shalt <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> with them, and shalt be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.

And let it be, when these <S%H226>signs<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, that thou <S%H6213>do<s%> as <S%H4672>occasion<s%> <S%H3027>serve<s%> thee; for <S%H430>God<s%> is with thee. And: Heb. And it shall come to pass, that when these signs, etc that: Heb. do for thee as thine hand shall find

And thou shalt go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>; and, behold, I will come <S%H3381>down<s%> unto thee, to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H3176>tarry<s%>, till I <S%H935>come<s%> to thee, and <S%H3045>shew<s%> thee what thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And it was so, that when he had <S%H6437>turned<s%> his <S%H7926>back<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> from <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>gave<s%> him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>: and all those <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to pass that <S%H3117>day<s%>. back: Heb. shoulder gave: Heb. turned

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> thither to the <S%H1389>hill<s%>, behold, a <S%H2256>company<s%> of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H7125>met<s%> him; and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> upon him, and he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And it came to pass, when all that <S%H3045>knew<s%> him <S%H865>beforetime<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that, behold, he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, then the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>, What is this that is come unto the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%>? Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>? one: Heb. a man to his neighbour

And <S%H376>one<s%> of the same place <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, But who is their <S%H1>father<s%>? Therefore it became a <S%H4912>proverb<s%>, Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>? of: Heb. from thence
And when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5012>prophesying<s%>, he <S%H935>came<s%> to the high <S%H1116>place<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him and to his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H575>Whither<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> ye? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H860>asses<s%>: and when we <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were no <S%H369>where<s%>, we <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, I pray thee, what <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto you.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1730>uncle<s%>, He <S%H5046>told<s%> us <S%H5046>plainly<s%> that the <S%H860>asses<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%>. But of the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>, whereof <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%>, he <S%H5046>told<s%> him not.
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6817>called<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> together unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%>;

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>, and of them that <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> you:

And ye have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, who himself <S%H3467>saved<s%> you out of all your <S%H7451>adversities<s%> and your <S%H6869>tribulations<s%>; and ye have <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Nay, but <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> over us. Now therefore <S%H3320>present<s%> yourselves <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and by your <S%H505>thousands<s%>.
And when <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> had caused all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to come <S%H7126>near<s%>, the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

When he had caused the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to come <S%H7126>near<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H4309>Matri<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>, and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>: and when they <S%H1245>sought<s%> him, he could not be <S%H4672>found<s%>.

Therefore they <S%H7592>enquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> further, if the <S%H376>man<s%> should yet <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1988>thither<s%>. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, Behold, he hath <S%H2244>hid<s%> himself among the <S%H3627>stuff<s%>.

And they <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> him thence: and when he <S%H3320>stood<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, he was <S%H1361>higher<s%> than any of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from his <S%H7926>shoulders<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%> ye him whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%>, that there is none like him among all the <S%H5971>people<s%>? And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, God <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>. God: Heb. Let the king live

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> it in a <S%H5612>book<s%>, and laid it <S%H3240>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>; and there <S%H3212>went<s%> with him a band of <S%H2428>men<s%>, whose <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5060>touched<s%>.

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, How shall this man <S%H3467>save<s%> us? And they <S%H959>despised<s%> him, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him no <S%H4503>presents<s%>. But he held his <S%H2790>peace<s%>. held: or, was as though he had been deaf
